title: Google\Cloud\Speech\V2\StreamingRecognitionFeatures
name: StreamingRecognitionFeatures
description:
Available recognition features specific to streaming recognition requests.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.speech.v2.StreamingRecognitionFeatures

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.enable_voice_activity_events
params.description: If true, responses with voice activity speech events will be returned as they are detected.

params.name: data.interim_results
params.description: Whether or not to stream interim results to the client. If set to true, interim results will be streamed to the client. Otherwise, only the final response will be streamed back.

params.name: data.voice_activity_timeout
params.description: If set, the server will automatically close the stream after the specified duration has elapsed after the last VOICE_ACTIVITY speech event has been sent. The field voice_activity_events must also be set to true.
